trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage" /> 的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> class is a complete implementation for a component editor page that consists of an empty window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage>類別是包含一個空的視窗元件編輯器頁面的完整實作。

trans-unit.source: You can extend this page to add your own controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擴充此頁面以新增您自己的控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> is used by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> 正由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates an example <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage>實作。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Activates and displays the page.
trans-unit.target: 啟動和顯示頁面。

trans-unit.source: Applies changes to all the components being edited.
trans-unit.target: 將變更套用至所有正在編輯的元件。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the editor should apply its changes before it is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 指定編輯器是否應在停用前套用其變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editor should apply its changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果編輯器應套用其變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The standard implementation returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 標準的實作會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the component to edit.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要編輯的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> this page allows you to edit.
trans-unit.target: 這個頁面允許您編輯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the creation parameters for the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that indicates the creation parameters for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，表示控制項的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand values: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Deactivates and hides the page.
trans-unit.target: 停用和隱藏頁面。

trans-unit.source: Increments the loading counter.
trans-unit.target: 遞增載入計數器。

trans-unit.source: Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page.
trans-unit.target: 應該先呼叫每個程序，以載入或初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>方法，以表示，它將會載入的項目才能編輯器 中顯示的載入的編輯器頁面。

trans-unit.source: When a loading procedure that called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> completes, it should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed.
trans-unit.target: 當載入程序，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>完成時，它應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A>方法，指出已完成載入程序的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>屬性會當做計數器以判斷當完成載入時使用。

trans-unit.source: A page is in loading mode if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 頁面是在載入模式，如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>屬性為非零。

trans-unit.source: Decrements the loading counter.
trans-unit.target: 遞減載入計數器。

trans-unit.source: Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page.
trans-unit.target: 應該先呼叫每個程序，以載入或初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>方法，以表示，它將會載入的項目才能編輯器 中顯示的載入的編輯器頁面。

trans-unit.source: When a loading procedure that called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A> completes, it should call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A> method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed.
trans-unit.target: 當載入程序，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.EnterLoadingMode%2A>完成時，它應該呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ExitLoadingMode%2A>方法，指出已完成載入程序的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>屬性會當做計數器以判斷當完成載入時使用。

trans-unit.source: A page is in loading mode if the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A> property is non-zero.
trans-unit.target: 頁面是在載入模式，如果值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.Loading%2A>屬性為非零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is being activated for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示頁面是否為第一次啟動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page has not previously been activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個頁面從未啟動過，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control that represents the window for this page.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項，表示這個頁面的視窗。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that represents the window for this page.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />，表示這個頁面的視窗。

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that is to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得要編輯的元件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> that is to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon for the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面的圖示。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" /> used to represent the page.
trans-unit.target: 用來表示頁面的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Icon" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the page is being activated for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示頁面是否為第一次啟動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this is the first time the page is being activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果頁面是第一次啟動，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the page is being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示是否正在載入頁面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page is being loaded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在載入頁面則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The message to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Processes messages that could be handled by the page.
trans-unit.target: 處理可由頁面處理的訊息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the page processed the message; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由頁面處理訊息則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method gives the page a chance to process messages before the caller uses them.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓網頁來處理訊息之前呼叫端會使用它們。

trans-unit.source: If this returns `true`, the message will be consumed; otherwise, the caller will continue to process the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳回`true`訊息將會是已使用，否則，呼叫端會繼續處理訊息。

trans-unit.source: Loads the component into the page user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 將元件載入網頁使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Each page must override this method and implement its own custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 每一頁必須覆寫這個方法，並實作其自己的自訂行為。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how many load dependencies remain until loading has been completed.
trans-unit.target: 表示要保留多少載入相依性，直到載入完成為止。

trans-unit.source: The number of remaining load dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 剩餘的載入相依性數目。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to track the number of loading stages remaining.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性用於追蹤剩餘的載入階段的數目。

trans-unit.source: For each process needed to completely load the document, this counter is incremented before loading begins, and decremented when each loading process completes.
trans-unit.target: 每個處理序需要完全載入文件，此計數器會累加載入開始，再遞減時處理每個載入完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a component must be loaded before editing can occur.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示元件是否必須先載入，才能編輯。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a component must be loaded before editing can occur; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元件必須先載入才能編輯，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Called when the page and any sibling pages have applied their changes.
trans-unit.target: 當頁面和任一同層網頁 (Sibling Page) 套用其變更時，就會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the page site.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面網站。

trans-unit.source: The page site.
trans-unit.target: 頁面網站。

trans-unit.source: The site for this component editor page.
trans-unit.target: 此元件編輯器頁面的網站。

trans-unit.source: Reloads the component for the page.
trans-unit.target: 重新載入頁面的元件。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the current component may have changed elsewhere and needs to be reloaded into the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 此方法時，會呼叫目前元件可能已變更其他位置，而且需要重新載入使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Saves the component from the page user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 儲存網頁使用者介面 (UI) 的元件。

trans-unit.source: Each page must override this method and implement its own custom behavior.
trans-unit.target: 每一頁必須覆寫這個方法，並實作其自己的自訂行為。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the component to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 設定要編輯的元件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the page as changed since the last load or save.
trans-unit.target: 將頁面設定為自上次載入或儲存後已經變更。

trans-unit.source: The site for this page.
trans-unit.target: 這個頁面的網站。

trans-unit.source: Sets the site for this page.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個頁面的網站。

trans-unit.source: Shows Help information if the page supports Help information.
trans-unit.target: 如果頁面支援說明資訊，則顯示說明資訊。

trans-unit.source: This is only called if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.SupportsHelp%2A> returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這只會呼叫如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.SupportsHelp%2A>傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The Help system calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A> method to provide Help for the page.
trans-unit.target: 說明系統呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A>方法以提供說明頁面。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A> is usually called in response to F1 or when the Help button is clicked to allow the page to bring up its associated Help topic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorPage.ShowHelp%2A> 通常會以回應 F1 或按一下 [說明] 按鈕允許頁面以顯示其相關聯的說明主題時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the editor supports Help.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示編輯器是否支援說明。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the editor supports Help; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果編輯器支援說明則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作會傳回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the title of the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面的標題。

trans-unit.source: The title of the page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面的標題。

trans-unit.source: The caller may use this to show the name of this editor before it's actually activated.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端可能會使用此顯示名稱，這個編輯器，在實際啟動之前。
